# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-102">Tilføje flag og påmindelser i Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-103">Sådan indstilles eller redigeres en påmindelse for en begivenhed:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-104">Gå til [Kalender](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-105">Vælg den begivenhed, du vil mindes om, og vælg derefter pilene i øverste højre hjørne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-106">for at udvide den.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-107">Vælg et påmindelsestidspunkt **ud for Påmind mig.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-108">Outlook.com gemmer automatisk dine ændringer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-109">Hvis du vil minde dig selv om at følge op på en meddelelse, kan du tilføje et opfølgningsflag:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-110">Gå til [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-111">Hold markøren over meddelelsen på meddelelseslisten for at se flagindstillingen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-112">Vælg flagikonet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-113">for at markere meddelelsen med flag.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-114">Hvis du vil se alle dine markerede meddelelser, skal du markere markeringen i nederste venstre hjørne af siden for at gå til Opgaver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d4eb8-115">Du kan få mere at vide ved at læse [Markér eller fastgøre en meddelelse i Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d4eb8-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
